alert.note: Alert for Jackson; White (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 10:45AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Independence, southern Jackson and northeastern White Counties through 1115 AM CDT... At 1045 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pleasant Plains, or 16 miles south of Batesville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Newport... Tuckerman... Diaz... Pleasant Plains... Oil Trough... Jacksonport... Algoa... Steprock... Campbell Station... Amagon... Weldon... Blackville... Shoffner... Thida... Heffington... Stegall... Roosevelt... Olyphant... Ingleside... Erwin... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
